snippet: GENATT--Les. The Mannino family mourn the loss of a great man. His wisdom, charm and talent helped inspire and shape many lives. Our deepest condolences to the entire Genatt family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GENATT--Les. The Mannino family mourn the loss of a great man. His wisdom, charm and talent helped inspire and shape many lives. Our deepest condolences to the entire Genatt family. 1/3
